data.text: Uthenga wonena za chipululu cha mʼmbali mwa Nyanja.
Chifukwa cha zimenezi thupi langa likunjenjemera ndi mantha,
Ankhondo a ku Elamu ndi Mediya akukonza matebulo,
Zimene Ambuye akunena kwa ine ndi izi;
Taonani, anthu akubwera ali pa akavalo
Taonani, uyo munthu akubwera atakwera pa galeta
Inu anthu anga opunthidwa ndi kupetedwa ngati tirigu,
Zimene Ambuye akunena kwa ine ndi izi: “Chaka chimodzi chisanathe, potsata mmene amawerengera munthu waganyu, ulemerero wonse wa Kedara udzatheratu.
Mwa anthu okoka uta, ankhondo a ku Kedara opulumuka adzakhala owerengeka.” Wayankhula ndi Yehova Mulungu wa Israeli.
